items.title: 'Ik heb Feyenoord dit seizoen nog niet z√≥ slecht gezien'
items.summary: Marciano Vink en Kenneth Perez zagen een slecht Feyenoord in de Eredivisie tegen FC Twente. De analytici zijn het erover eens dat de Rotterdammers dit seizoen nog niet z√≥ slecht voor de dag zijn gekomen als zondagmiddag in De Kuip.

items.title: Amorim maakt zich zorgen om geblesseerde Fernandes: 'Ligt er weken uit'
items.summary: Bruno Fernandes moest zondag in de rust noodgedwongen worden gewisseld vanwege een blessure, iets waar zijn trainer R√∫ben Amorim zich zorgen over maakt.

items.title: Morocco v Comoros: Africa Cup of Nations opener ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Afcon updates from the 7pm GMT kick-off in Morocco ‚öΩ Live scores | Fixtures | Follow us on Bluesky | Mail John The teams take to the field in Rabat, the stadium looks close to full, the home fans are expectant. Can Morocco set a standard? On the field at Rabat, at the Complexe Sportif Prince Moulay Abdellah, CAF President Dr Pratrice Motsepe has takes to declare the AFCON open. Sadly, UK coverage of the opening ceremony has been non-existent. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Saibari en Salah-Eddine met Marokko begonnen aan Afrika Cup
items.summary: Naast de duels van PSV en Feyenoord die we in een apart liveblog volgen, staan er nog drie Eredivisie-duels op het programma. Daarnaast wordt er ook volop gevoetbald in het buitenland. In deze VI Live blijf je daarvan volledig op de hoogte.

items.title: 'Hearts have arrived'...but McInnes warns they can get better
items.summary: Hearts "have arrived" as Scottish Premiership title contenders after beating Rangers for the second time this season, says Kris Boyd.

items.title: United's Fernandes subbed after apparent injury
items.summary: Manchester United's Bruno Fernandes was substituted at halftime of the team's Premier League clash against Aston Villa with an apparent hamstring issue.

items.title: Sources: Liverpool fear 'significant' Isak injury
items.summary: Sources have told ESPN that Liverpool fear Alexander Isak's injury may be significant.

items.title: Raphinha, Yamal star as Barcelona extend lead
items.summary: Raphinha and Lamine Yamal got on the scoresheet as Barcelona beat Villarreal 2-0.

items.title: Kane hits 30th goal in Bayern rout of Heidenheim
items.summary: Harry Kane scored his 30th club goal of the season as Bayern Munich shrugged off an injury and illness crisis to sweep past Heidenheim 4-0 on Sunday and go into the Bundesliga's winter break with a nine-point lead.

items.title: Oufkir neemt afscheid van Sparta: 'De AZ-fans gaan zeker genieten'
items.summary: Ayoub Oufkr is ervan overtuigd dat de supporters van AZ van hem gaan genieten. De negentienjarige aanvaller vertrekt deze winter van Sparta naar Alkmaar en heeft daar enorm veel zin in.

items.title: Op deze zender kijk je naar het openingsduel van Marokko op de Afrika Cup
items.summary: Aan het einde van 2025 gaat de Afrika Cup van start. Voor veel Europese clubs betekent dat dat zij spelers een tijdje kwijt zijn, maar voor Afrika is het vooral een groot voetbalfeest. Voetbal International praat je bij over het toernooi.

items.title: Gallagher Premiership: Bath show dominance away over Newcastle
items.summary: Bath head of rugby Johann van Graan hailed a "satisfying performance" as his side completed a dominant 50-14 Gallagher Premiership win over Newcastle Red Bulls.

items.title: Morgan Rogers double sinks Manchester United and keeps Aston Villa on leaders‚Äô heels
items.summary: There is simply no stopping this Aston Villa machine, cylinders pumping, exclusively handcrafted by Unai Emery, the manager who reacted to Morgan Rogers‚Äô winning goal against Manchester United by launching his jacket into the night sky. ‚ÄúBirmingham, are you listening?‚Äù came the chorus from the home support but this was another victory with wider implications. For now Villa, third and three points behind Premier League leaders Arsenal, are firmly in the title race, two more brilliant Rogers goals earning a 10th straight win in all competitions and rendering Matheus Cunha‚Äôs well-taken equaliser nothing more than a consolation. A frustrating defeat for Ruben Amorim was compounded by his captain, Bruno Fernandes, being forced off through injury at half-time. Continue reading...

items.title: Rogers steals the show AGAIN as Villa continue winning run against Man Utd
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Aston Villa‚Äôs win against Manchester United in the Premier League.

items.title: Premier League recap, reaction: Rogers fires Aston Villa to big win vs. Man United
items.summary: Morgan Rogers was the hero as Aston Villa defeated Man United 2-1 on Sunday to go seven points clear of fourth-place Chelsea and establish themselves in the title race.

items.title: Rogers' stunning double downs Man Utd as Villa win again
items.summary: Morgan Rogers scored twice for Aston Villa as they beat Manchester United 2-1 at Villa Park to make it 10 wins in a row in all competitions.

items.title: Incredible moment 86-year-old Lee Trevino holes out for an eagle!
items.summary: During the closing round of the 2025 PNC Championship, Lee Trevino holes out for an eagle on the par-four 13th hole at the Ritz-Carlton Golf Club.

items.title: West Ham set to appoint Guarino as manager
items.summary: West Ham are set to appoint Rita Guarino as their women's team manager following the sacking of Rehanne Skinner.

items.title: London City Lionesses sack manager Pr√™cheur while West Ham close on Guarino
items.summary: Frenchman led team to promotion from second tier Hammers set to turn to former Juventus head coach London City Lionesses have sacked their manager Jocelyn Pr√™cheur, with the newly-promoted club sitting sixth in the Women‚Äôs Super League table. The Frenchman oversaw London City‚Äôs promotion to the WSL last season and has guided them to the top half of the top tier, but the big-spending club are known to be ambitious and their defeat away against Leicester a week ago was their sixth of the season. Pr√™cheur is the second WSL manager to lose their job in the space of four days, following Rehanne Skinner‚Äôs sacking by West Ham on Thursday. Continue reading...

items.title: European football: Lamine Yamal on target as Barcelona battle past 10-man Villarreal
items.summary: Barcelona head into new year on top of La Liga Kane scores again in Bayern‚Äôs 4-0 rout of Heidenheim Barcelona secured a composed 2-0 La Liga victory at Villarreal on Sunday thanks to goals from Raphinha and Lamine Yamal in a match that tilted firmly in the visitors‚Äô favour when the hosts were reduced to 10 men just before the break. It took just 12 minutes for Barcelona to take the lead from the penalty spot after Santi Comesana blocked Raphinha with his back as the winger tried to break through and the Brazilian calmly converted the spot-kick. This story will be updated Continue reading...
